pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Interactive Graphics via HTML // Interactive data visualization supporting linked graphs can help users easily explore data and gain valuable insights and enables such visualization and interactive re-analysis using HTML5 canvas and JavaScript. Its R API is designed to create a seamless analysis, visualization, and re-analysis workflow for interactive visualization and analysis. Since HTML5 canvas and JavaScript is supported in virtually all modern web browsers, the visualizations can be delivered to almost any device/platform for presentation purposes.
